settings.calm-down-period-help: After the application is rejected, it is not allowed to reapply for N days from the date of rejection
settings.show-index-help: Display the review menu on the homepage
settings.mail-title-help: The invitee receives the title content of the email
settings.auto-review-help: After checking, the system will automatically pass and complete the review operation
settings.auto-review-username-help: When automatic auditing is enabled, the system will query the entered users
settings.group-blacklist-view: Blacklist user group (users in this group will not be able to purchase products)
settings.group-help: After registering, the user defaults to being a member of the user group

forum.title: Invite
forum.email-help: The invitee's email will be linked to the forum's registered email.
forum.remark-help: Only visible to oneself and management (can be left blank).
forum.username-help: The invitee's username is not bound to the forum's registered username
forum.link-help: Confirmation of invitee information by reviewers (this information can only be viewed by reviewers and dispensing personnel)
forum.link-2-help: Confirmation of invitee information by reviewers (this information can only be viewed by reviewers and dispensing personnel)

error.unaudited: You have unapproved application information and cannot continue the application at this time
error.review-failed: You have recently received rejected application information. Please try again after [{date}]
error.invite-not-exist: The application information has been reviewed or does not exist. Please refresh the page and try again
error.lock-resources: The current resource is locked. Please try again later
error.email-inconsistency: The email and invitation information do not match. Please use the email that received the invitation code
error.username-inconsistency: The username does not match the invitation information. Please register using the username provided in the email
error.link-not-exist: link of the invitee cannot be empty
